data.description:
Immerse yourself in Eerie Tamarin, a cutting-edge VR horror game that plunges you into the heart of an abandoned laboratory. Developed by MapleGX and OrigamiGX and utilizing the innovative gorilla locomotion system by Another Axiom, this game offers a uniquely terrifying experience.

Explore a forsaken research facility, once a beacon of scientific progress, now twisted into a nightmarish maze. The gorilla locomotion system allows you to move through the dark, claustrophobic spaces with a sense of physicality like never before. Swing, crawl, and climb as you navigate the decaying corridors and sinister labs.

The laboratory is rife with eerie remnants and grotesque experiments gone awry. Youâ€™ll encounter horrifying creatures with advanced AI that reacts dynamically to your presence, ensuring no two encounters are the same. The chilling sound design and haunting visuals further amplify the sense of dread and immersion.

Every step and movement in Eerie Tamarin heightens the tension as you uncover dark secrets hidden within the facility. Will you survive the horrors lurking in the shadows, or will the malevolent forces within the lab consume you? Prepare for a VR horror adventure that tests both your physical agility and psychological endurance.
